page.title: 09TYPICAL FAMILY SATURDAY
page.content: We all get up at the usual time-8 o'clock.We have breakfast together.Afterwards,daddy goes out to work in the garden-weeding or digging.Perhaps he will work on his climbing equipment,because he is a mountain guide in the Cullins,near to our house.Mummy usually does the housework,while I play with my little brother at football.Sometimes we go fishing in the river nearby,but we do not catch fish very often! Lunch is normally soup and sandwiches,and after it daddy and I sit down with a cup of tea to watch the football on television.I hope Aberdeen win because they are my favourite team. After tea,I play with my brother and daddy and mummy write letters or read.Before bed,we watch television together for a while.
